Action.body: , where filePath is the part of the JSON path name that is under the metadataPath. if metadataPath is '/something/moresomething/mymeta' and a file is '/something/moresomething/mymeta/statedb/couchdb/indexes/index.json' then the package would contain '/META-INF/statedb/couchdb/indexes/index.json'. Collection json files are read and the info placed not within the chaincode package, but placed into the gRPC request when instantiating. >
